postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
The responsibilities of the full time cafe manager position includes: 
 
- Managing all F&B and day-to-day operations within budget and to the highest standards 
- Ensuring excellent levels of internal and external customer service 
- Leading F&B team by attracting, recruiting, training and appraising talented personnel 
- Preserve excellent levels of internal and external customer service 
- Comply with all health and safety regulations 
- Report on management regarding sales results and productivity 
 
Job brief 
 
We are looking for a professional food and beverage manager to be responsible for managing all F&B operations and for delivering an excellent guest experience. The successful candidate will be able to forecast, plan and manage all F&B orders, staff and finance. The goal is to maximize sales and revenue through customer satisfaction and employee engagement. 
 
Requirements 
- Singaporean or SPR (foreigners are open to apply: Korean, Malaysian, Taiwanese) 
- Ability to spot and resolve problems efficiently 
- Communication and leadership skills 
- Up to date with food and beverages trends and best practices 
- A good team-player 
 
Drop us an email at shyuhaila (a) gmail.com
title: Full Time Staff in Dessert Cafe

Well known Vegetarian Restaurant Looking for Temp Staff!! 
 
Salary: $8/hr 
Working Hrs: 11.00am - 10.00pm 
Location: Tanjong Katong Road 
Duration: Jan 2017 -- Feb 2017 (must be able to commit during CNY period) 
 
Duties: 
•	Provide excellent customer services that promote satisfaction 
•	Greet customers and present menu 
•	Make recommendations or share additional information upon request

I am a professional Chef and Entrepreneur, with a very High curiosity, Knowledge and Passion about Food and Wine. I will open a Bistro / Wine Merchant in Singapore and I looking for like minded person as Business Partners with a genuine interest in Food and willing to create something special, unique and profitable. 
You can have whatever background, the most important thing for me you should be a creative, a foodie person and love hospitality. 
 
I looking forward to hearing from you !
title: Start-UP : Bistro looking for Business Partners and Staff"
